long_description: MCP server for managing Cloudinary structured metadata including creating, updating, and managing metadata fields and rules.
name: @cloudinary/structured-metadata-mcp

tools.name: create-metadata-field
tools.description:
Creates a new structured metadata field in your account

Creates a new metadata field with the specified properties and configuration.

tools.name: list-metadata-fields
tools.description:
Lists all structured metadata fields defined in your Cloudinary product environment

Retrieves a list of all metadata fields in the product environment based on the provided filters.

tools.name: get-metadata-field
tools.description:
Retrieves the definition of a specific structured metadata field by its identifier (external_id)

Retrieves detailed information about the specified metadata field.

tools.name: update-metadata-field
tools.description:
Updates the configuration of an existing metadata field

Updates the properties and configuration of the specified metadata field.

tools.name: delete-metadata-field
tools.description:
Deletes a structured metadata field definition from your account

Permanently deletes the specified metadata field and all its associated data.

tools.name: update-metadata-datasource-values
tools.description:
Updates the allowed values (the datasource) for a specified metadata field

Updates the values in a metadata field's datasource, including adding, modifying, or changing the order of values.

tools.name: delete-metadata-datasource-values
tools.description:
Removes one or more allowed values from a metadata field's datasource

Removes specific values from a metadata field's datasource by their external IDs.

tools.name: create-metadata-rule
tools.description:
Creates a new conditional metadata rule

Creates a new metadata rule with the specified properties and configuration.

tools.name: list-metadata-rules
tools.description:
Retrieves a list of all conditional metadata rules defined in your accountcloudinary

Retrieves a list of all metadata rules in the cloud.

tools.name: update-metadata-rule
tools.description:
Updates an existing conditional metadata rule's definition

Updates the properties and configuration of an existing metadata rule.

tools.name: delete-metadata-rule
tools.description:
Deletes a conditional metadata rule by its ID

Permanently deletes a metadata rule.

cloud_name.description: Your Cloudinary cloud name (required). Find it in your Cloudinary Dashboard.
cloud_name.title: Cloud Name

api_key.description: Your Cloudinary API key. Found in Dashboard → Settings → Access Keys.
api_key.title: API Key

api_secret.description: Your Cloudinary API secret. Found in Dashboard → Settings → Access Keys.
api_secret.title: API Secret
